CSSSkewX.summary: The CSSSkewX interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the {{cssxref("transform-function/skewX", "skewX()")}} value of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSSkewXAx.summary:
The ax property of the
interface gets and sets the angle used to distort the element
along the x-axis (or abscissa).

CSSSkewXCSSSkewX.summary:
The CSSSkewX() constructor creates a new
object which represents the
transform-function/skewX
value of the individual 'transform' property in CSS.
